Introduction to Source Water Protection
Introduction to
Source Water
Protection

What Is Source Water Protection?
What Is Source Water
Protection?

Taking proactive measures to prevent the pollution of lakes, rivers, streams and ground water that serve as sources of drinking water.
Taking proactive measures to prevent the T a k i n g
p r o a c t i v e m e a s u r e s
t o
p r e v e n t
t h e
pollution of lakes, rivers, streams and
ground water that serve as sources of
drinking water.

Wellhead Protection is another frequently used term that applies to Source Water Protection for ground water sources.
Wellhead Protection is another frequently used
term that applies to Source Water Protection
for ground water sources.

What is a Source Water Assessment?
What is a Source
Water Assessment?

Delineation
Delineation

An evaluation, using a specified set of procedures, to determine the human activities that are possible sources of contamination to which a drinking water source is most vulnerable.
An evaluation, using a specified set of
procedures, to determine the human
activities that are possible sources of
contamination to which a drinking
water source is most vulnerable.
